introduction_section.heading: What is
content: At Devisgon, we leverage low-code platforms like OutSystems, Mendix, PowerApps, and Retool, along with custom scripts, to create apps that are faster to deploy, scalable, and future-proof. Unlike no-code, low-code lets us insert code where needed, ensuring complex workflows and integrations are possible.
This approach reduces development costs, accelerates launch timelines, and allows businesses to test, iterate, and evolve applications quickly.

case_study_section.headline: Automated Onboarding Flow Saved 20+ Hours per Week

content.label: Problem
content.text: A healthcare company needed a patient management system but had limited time and budget.

content.label: Solution
content.text: We built the system using Microsoft PowerApps + custom APIs, integrating scheduling, reporting, and analytics.

content.label: Result
content.text: The app launched in just 6 weeks, reducing manual reporting time by 40% and improving patient engagement.

questions.question: Which tools can you automate?
questions.answer: Typically, an MVP can be developed in 4-6 weeks depending on the complexity of the features.

questions.question: Will automation replace my team?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer post-launch maintenance and support packages to ensure your application runs smoothly.

questions.question: How much time can automation save?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in integrating AI models into existing architectures via API.

questions.question: Do you create AI agents?
questions.answer: We primarily use Next.js, React, Node.js, Python, and cloud services like AWS or Vercel.
